mapper.insert: insert into oper_anesthesia_record(id,hosp_code, oper_id, visit_id, anesthesia_date,weight, height, oper_disease_before, oper_disease_after, asa_code, proposed_oper, anesthesia_code, anesthesia_method, position_code, lateraldecubitus_code,in_room_time, anesthesia_time, intubation_time, extubation_time, oper_start_time, oper_end_time, back_time, perform_surgery, operation_doctor, anaesthesia_doctor, handwashing_nurse, remark, interval_minute, updt_id, updt_name, updt_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id},#{hospCode}, #{operId}, #{visitId}, #{anesthesiaDate}, #{weight}, #{height}, #{operDiseaseBefore}, #{operDiseaseAfter}, #{asaCode}, #{proposedOper}, #{anesthesiaCode}, #{anesthesiaMethod}, #{positionCode}, #{lateraldecubitusCode}, #{inRoomTime}, #{anesthesiaTime}, #{intubationTime}, #{extubationTime}, #{operStartTime}, #{operEndTime}, #{backTime}, #{performSurgery}, #{operationDoctor}, #{anaesthesiaDoctor}, #{handwashingNurse}, #{remark}, #{intervalMinute}, #{updtId}, #{updtName}, #{updtTime}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})
mapper.update:
update oper_anesthesia_record
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
oper_id = #{operId},
anesthesia_date = #{anesthesiaDate},
visit_id = #{visitId},
weight = #{weight},
height = #{height},
oper_disease_before = #{operDiseaseBefore},
oper_disease_after = #{operDiseaseAfter},
asa_code = #{asaCode},
proposed_oper = #{proposedOper},
lateraldecubitus_code = #{lateraldecubitusCode},
anesthesia_code = #{anesthesiaCode},
anesthesia_method = #{anesthesiaMethod},
position_code = #{positionCode},
in_room_time = #{inRoomTime},
anesthesia_time = #{anesthesiaTime},
intubation_time = #{intubationTime},
extubation_time = #{extubationTime},
oper_start_time = #{operStartTime},
oper_end_time = #{operEndTime},
back_time = #{backTime},
perform_surgery = #{performSurgery},
operation_doctor = #{operationDoctor},
anaesthesia_doctor = #{anaesthesiaDoctor},
handwashing_nurse = #{handwashingNurse},
remark = #{remark},
interval_minute = #{intervalMinute},
updt_id = #{updtId},
updt_name = #{updtName},
updt_time = #{updtTime},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from oper_anesthesia_record where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, anesthesia_id, remark, type_code, value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, value6, value7, value8, value9, value10, updt_id, updt_name, updt_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from oper_anesthesia_durg where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.insert:

(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.anesthesiaId}, #{item.remark},#{item.typeCode}, #{item.value1}, #{item.value2}, #{item.value3}, #{item.value4}, #{item.value5}, #{item.value6}, #{item.value7}, #{item.value8}, #{item.value9}, #{item.value10}, #{item.updtId}, #{item.updtName}, #{item.updtTime}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime})
